Name: Chromancy
About the game: Chromancy is a shooter game that tests your wits and reflexes at the same time! Using the ability to change color between red, green and blue, you will face enemies, dodge obstacles, solve puzzles and fight bosses through 50 fun and challenging levels. From shooting different colored bullets to absorbing enemy projectiles of the same color, one must master the power of RGB in order to conquer this game.
